title: Herman's Hermits Hilton show
creator_credit: Ted Gregory, Garry Stewart and Rod Kinnear
brief_description: A virtually un-cut performance by the inimitable sixties rock band, Herman’s Hermits. Includes many of their well-known hits including Can’t you hear my heart beat, Jezebel, I’m into something good, Mrs Brown (you’ve got a lovely daughter). Sponsored by Hilton Hosery.
creator_credit_for_label: Ted Gregory, Garry Stewart and Rod Kinnear
